channel.title: CVE Feed for Bosch -- BF-OS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bosch -- BF-OS

item.title: CVE-2022-36301|2024-08-03T10:00:04.319Z -- bosch -- bf-os
item.description: BF-OS version 3.x up to and including 3.83 do not enforce strong passwords which may allow a remote attacker to brute-force the device password.

item.title: CVE-2022-36302|2024-08-03T10:00:04.271Z -- bosch -- bf-os
item.description: File path manipulation vulnerability in BF-OS version 3.00 up to and including 3.83 allows an attacker to modify the file path to access different resources, which may contain sensitive information.
